room_title: Escape room "Family Fortune" by The Escape Works in Watertown
room_description: Your poor old aunt Edna has been growing increasingly paranoid over recent years. Since the passing of her husband and the payout of his sizable life insurance policy and his many years in the diamond industry, she has suspected the entire family has been trying to steal the inheritance and for, as it turns out, a good reason! Her children have moved her into the notorious nursing home, Mildew Meadows, she is appealing to you, her favorite relative, to enter her condo, retrieve some personal belongings, and arrange to have them sent to her. The inheritance is carefully hidden somewhere in Edna’s condo, and it’s protected by layers of tricks and traps. If you’re clever and quick, you may be able to find this wealth that has eluded many before you.
